lead_paragraph: Natural gas prices may be down 20 percent this year and crude oil may be trading sideways, but deal-making in the energy sector is surging.
snippet: There have been some $199 billion worth of United States energy and power deals announced so far this year, up sharply from last year, according to Thomson Reuters data.
abstract: There have been some $199 billion worth of United States energy and power deals announced so far this year, up sharply from last year, according to Thomson Reuters data.
